LanguageData.FireSuit.label: Fire Suit
LanguageData.FireSuit.description: A fire resistance suit of armor.
LanguageData.Flamethrower.label: Flamethrower
LanguageData.Flamethrower.description: A fire resistance suit of armor.
LanguageData.PowerWeapons.label: Power Weapons
LanguageData.PowerWeapons.description: A set of craftable weapons. These weapons are constructed around a powercore, making them increadibly strong.
